titleStmt.title: The admirable deliuerance of 266. Christians by Iohn Reynard Englishman from the captiuitie of the Turkes, who had been gally slaues many yeares in Alexandria The number of the seuerall nations that were captiues follow in the next page.
titleStmt.author: Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Dawson, and are to be sold [by P. Harrison] at the little shop at the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the little shop at the Exchange
